item.title: Take Pretty Screenshot
item.description: As you may imagine after complete a project you need to create a pretty, clear, and glaring README file. I believe it’s a de facto standard for open-source projects anymore. If you want to create an imposing markdown, you should use visual materials and efficient tongue for your audience. Here is one of my favorite tool for creating awesome README and editing screen shots. The App is Shutter Unfortunately this app does not exist in the official Manjaro Repos.
